TopicTitle: How much do the new planets suck...?

Articles.Content:
...literally.

That is to say, what are the Standard Gravitational Parameters of Eve, Duna, Moho and the rest? People have visited other worlds using mathematics so the information must exist somewhere, but I'll be damned if I can find it.

Thanks in advance.

If you use the ISA mapsat mod, it has a very good wiki that has most of the information your looking for.

EDIT: For all planets and moons, that is.
There is already a thread with Planet Information.
